name: Space Shift (CorrosiveKnifer)
description:
Traverse through a broken reality while avoiding the time guards. This game was solo developed for a 1st-year 2D programming assignment in 2020. SFML was used as a rendering framework, while it was programmed in visual studios using C++. I independently developed the editor in NetBeans using Java. All ART/SOUND WAS SOURCED FROM THE INTERNET, however, I animated the player/guard sprites.

Controls
  • A/D                           - Move the player
  • Space                       - Jump
  • E                                 - Pick up boxes
  • Q                                - Drop boxes
  • L. Shift                    - Walk
  • R                                - Restart Level
  • ESC                          - Pause
Create your own levels!
  1. Download the level editor .zip from itch.io
  2. Create a new level .ini.
  3. Include at least one portal and one spawn.
  4. Save the new level inside the 'assets/levels/' folder.
  5. Edit the levels.ini to include the newly created level (add new L# entry and increment LCount).
  6. Play the game, where your level should be displayed inside the select list.
